I usually wear a medium but I ordered a large and it’s perfectly cozy without looking sloppy. Feels good, waist not tight, cropped but not too much. I’ll def order more colors. Haven’t washed it yet but will not dry all the way for sure.

Perfect, perfect, perfect fit! Feel so soft and at first i was hesitant as to what size cuz i am usually a medium and did that from another brand and oh my too large. I purchased this lounge set based on description and reviews. I am 5 1", 120 for reference. I wanted a put together, oversized, comfortable,  versatile  lounge set and this hit the mark. It's a great value as well. I washed it in cold put on gentle cycle and hung to dry. It dried without any shrinkage.  You can hang out at home or accessorize it and wear out for a casual put together look. I purchased 2 other colors.  You will ❤️ it!

I was looking for a comfy and cute fall outfit that I could wear both at home and out. While I really wanted to like this sweatsuit, unfortunately, the pants were very short and didn’t fit me well. It’s a shame because the material and design are great. Sadly, I had to send them back

Really wishing this worked for me because it is very comfy.  However, it’s VERY short.  I’m only 5”3’ with extremely short legs and these pants were too short for me. I’ve ordered at least four other two-piece travel sets from Amazon, and this is the best one for a shorter frame yet. I am 5’4” 150 lbs, 38D bust  with a longer torso, broad shoulders, and shorter legs.  These pants hit right above my ankle (which is what I wanted) and the rise is good for my frame. The waist is a little tight, but not too bad. I wish it had wider elastic at the waist to help with tummy control, but it’s ok as is and certainly better than many of the other sets I’ve tried. The top is cropped but still meets the waist band, providing full coverage, even with my longer torso, large bust, and broad shoulders. The color is good. It’s not perfect, but it will do.
I love this set bc it’s very comfortable and it’s true to size, I have no complaints to far. I decided to get more colors bc they match with anything. Recommend to anyone

I can confirm this loungewear set is made of 100% Rayon. I prefer loungewear sets made with nature materials. Cotton is the best, but rayon is a second runner up. Rayon is basically chemically processed cotton. The fabric feels like cotton, is soft, and has a nice medium thickness to it. I love that the pants have pockets. I’m 5’4, 150 pounds, and the medium fit great. I bought more colors :)
Comfy material, good length of sleeve and pants. Would only buy again for deal price
So soft, great fit

评论概述: Perfect fit, color, comfort. Note: it’s cotton not rayon.
评论详情: I bought this in Dark Grey, size Medium. I’m ~5’3” 140lb and it fits wonderfully. The pants are a bit long on me, so they could be hemmed but they work fine without. The cropped top is boxy and flowy, which sometimes allows a cool draft so I recommend wearing a shirt underneath in cooler weather.  My only real note is that for some reason, both the listing and the physical tag say “100% rayon” when it’s clearly cotton. Not sure why.
Love this set.  Super comfortable and better than I expected!  The pant length is perfect since I’m 5’4, fits right about ankle length.

Washed very carefully in cold water. Shrinking was terrible. After washing the bottom of the top turned up and even when pressed with a steam iron it didn’t work. I ordered in the yellow and green. Very disappointed!
The fabric is nicer than I expected, it’s more of a soft sweater material. The pants are a little tight around the bum for those who are more curvy.
Feels so nice and is so comfortable… I love it!
This is so soft and comfortable.  Love it.

The shirt is so short, and I even have a short torso. The pants have a seam that goes right up the center, so be mindful of that. The pants were also too tight compared to the size recommendations by both Amazon and the chart. I would suggest going up a size or 2 if you want it to fit like the model (and if you don’t want the c-toe seam to show).  Lots of potential in this outfit but for value, I expected more. Seriously, this ain’t nothin’ special for the price I paid. And if you are still interested, keep it in your cart and watch it. The price was all over the place over the course of one week.  BUT, if it fits you properly, I bet you look adorable. This is the type of athleisure we all want, but not all can wear.
Absolutely love this outfit.  So comfortable!  I got so many compliments.  Plan on ordering again in another color!
